QuestData.Title: Shark Tank
QuestData.Description: I hate sharks. All of my troops hate sharks too. This is where you come in, $n.$b$bI need you to head up to the Cape of Lost Hope and take out a huge shark named Tank. Tank is not to be trifled with so I would bring a few friends if I were you.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Jaws has nothing on this guy.
QuestData.LogDescription: You have been tasked to kill Tank, a large shark cruising the waters of the Cape of Lost Hope. The cape can be found north of here, along the northern coastline.
